attributes.action: take urgent action to reverse this government's preoccupation with the introduction of measures intended to capture, analyse and redistribute various sets of data related to the personal activities, habits and travel of persons resident in the UK thereby eroding fundamental freedoms for which our forefathers fought two world wars
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Current and proposed measures are introducing a 'big brother is watching you' society in which data capture is undertaken ostensibly for ant-terrorist reasons but in reality because it provides government with greater opportunities for manipulative control and taxation of citizens.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
